Reviews.Title: “Stay away!”

Reviews.Content: ive returned horrible hotel ive stayed payed 5 beds shower kitchen 15 square meter beds tiny bathroom paid price else worse staff rude inconvenient females verbally abused staff alcoholics forbidden allowed apparently storage luggage checkout staff couldnt understand english wasnt cheap stay hundreds cheaper hotels berlin stay rotten ones

Reviews.Content: friends shared apartment alex hotel nights thoroughly enjoyed stay little surprised layout apartment beds contained kitchenette remaining beds indeed surprised settled comfortably guests spacious disappointed impressed renovated look appreciated spotless cleanliness immediately hotel offers little park nearby beautiful jogging retreat morning run alexanderplatz mere tenminute walk 4 tram stops literally outside door hotel getting heart berlin breeze complimentary breakfast fresh enjoyed dining near entrance design pleasant coffee house ambiance finally friendliness cant possibly overstated final bonus free wifi available overall stay alex hotel enthusiastically recommend friends
